response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business operations. Given its high value and unique features, I estimate its worth to be $15,000 to me. However, considering its potential impact on your company, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This represents a significant saving for you while ensuring that I receive a fair return for my investment. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal.", "product_price": 12000}
